ayirin nanayakkara mathiniya - nasigiya (welanda wyaparika somagiri mudalali) sarath nanayakkara mahathage aadaraniya bharyawa wuda, nandana, sandhya, champika (sampath bankuwa) yana ayage aadaraniya maniyan wuda, niroshi, wijitha jayathilaka, chamin jayasena yana ayage aadaraniya nandaniya wuda, bawani, kalanaka, panduka, yasara, yanara yana ayage aadaraniya miththaniyawuda, ayirin nanayakkara mathiniya abhawapraptha wiya.

aada­raya pasu doren - pala yana bawin ada weda­na­wen indimi - diwa ra dukin nada koti­yak mila mudal - muthu manik na denda mage duppath kamata - epa man paganda kolom pura wisayi mata - upan gama “wadanda” thawath mata ba manike - meduk iwasa inda methek ma “siyalu duk - pani” kiya rakkemi thawath iwa­sanu bariya - oben ena duk gini yalith mehi noemi mama - ada geyin nikmemi eheth ma niwa­ra­diya - ape hada­wath daniee.

aya muluthangeyin udyana yata piwisiyaya.ma aya pasu pasa gaman kalemi.aya ma kadawannak men ma sithata dane.awata parisaraya gana adureya.aatha payinas gas athurin sada basayanu pene.sithala sulaga ata midulu dakwa kida basi.dan aa pasupasa pihiti padipela basa adi parak wetha piwisiyaya.aathin asunu naringe hu hadath bakamunange hm hm hadath arennata parisaraya nihadaya.ma nawathath charu lesa amathimi.aa nasunak men lantharumaka ragena gaman karayi.adi para gal boralu sahithaya .ma kipa warak paya lissa watennata giyada aya kisi apahasu thawak nomathiwa gaman karayi.aya ha ma athara paratharaya adi10k tharam ya.yara kipayak aathin gara watuna godanagillak dis we.aya ee desata gaman karayi.eya atha hara damu niwasaki.niwase wahala kotas kadi bidi atha.biththi pura wal bihiwi atha.aya niwase idiri doratuwen athulu wi nopeni giyaya.ma aya pasupasa gaman kalemi.ma niwase isthoppuwa ta gida wunemi.ehi bimata athiru lali dira gos atha.wahalaye kadatholu atharin sada eliya wate.pradhana doratuwa wiwrutha wa atha.ee thulin niwasa thula thaba athi lantharumaka eliya diswe.eya dariya gena lantharumayi.ma niwasa thulata athulu wimi.ehi wuye dara gatha nohaki pus gadaki.wisiththa kamaraye kanappuwak matha lantharuma thaba atha.eeta yabadawa aththe parani kabinattuwaki.ee haruna wita wenath kisiwak natha.lantharum eliyen ma dutuwe bithiyak matha ella thibu jayaruwaki.ehi wuye mawak ha diyaniyaki.dewiyane nandani nandayi charuyi.mata ibetamakiyawini.ee samagama ma depa mulata yamak kada watuni.ma pahathata nami baluwemi.eya dina pothaki.durwarna wu ehi mul pituwe 1990 lesa satahan wi thibuni.ma eya ahula kaba sakkuwe dagena nagitimata uthsaha kalemi.namuth kawurun ho mage pitamatha sitagena sitinna se barak dane.ma waha idiriyata panne kisith sitha gatha nohakiwaya.lantharum eliyen ma dutuwe biyen lomu daha ganwena darshanayaki.wahalaye balkaye sita pahalata watuna lanu potak aga elli sitiye gela pasekata kada watunu digu gawuma kin sarasunu gahaniyaki.ehi muhunak nothibu athara his kabala pamanak ithuru wi thibuni.eya semen paddeyi.ma niwase sita bangalawata diwwe yatigiriyen kagasamini.
